めに遭う: (めにあう) - to go through; to suffer; to experience (something unpleasant)
めはり寿司: (めはりずし) - rice ball wrapped in pickled leaf mustard greens
めばち: (めばちこ) - (めばちこ is Osaka dialect) sty (on the eyelid); stye
めばちこ: (めばちこ) - (めばちこ is Osaka dialect) sty (on the eyelid); stye
めばり剥ぐ: (めばりはぐ) - removing the weather stripping in spring
めやも: (めやも) - might it be... No, I guess it's not; (at sentence end) indicates irony and deep emotion
めらめら: (めらめら) - flaring up; bursting into flames
めりはりの利いた: (めりはりのきいた) - explicit; clear; unambiguous; meaningful; lively
めりはりを利かせた: (めりはりをきかせた) - explicit; clear; unambiguous; meaningful; lively
めりめり: (めりめり) - splintering or cracking (e.g. in a strong wind)
めり込む: (めりこむ) - to sink into; to cave in
め組の頭: (めぐみのかしら) - fire brigade chief (in Edo); chief fireman
もう: (もう) - now/soon/shortly/before long/presently; already/yet/by now/(not) anymore; further/more/again/another/the other; interjection used to strengthen expression of an emotion (often exasperation)
もういっちょ: (もういっちょ) - (from もう一度)  once more; again
もうけ物: (もうけもの) - good bargain; a find; godsend; a steal
もうすっかり: (もうすっかり) - already completed (arrived, happened, etc.)
もうた: (もうた) - (after the -te form of a verb)  having done ... by mistake; having messed up ...
もうたくさん: (もうたくさん) - enough is enough; no further!
もうちょっとしたら: (もうちょっとしたら) - in a little while (referring to the very near future on the order of minutes); in a bit
もうひと踏ん張り: (もうひとふんばり) - holding out a little longer
もうひと頑張り: (もうひとがんばり) - an extra effort; going the extra mile; one final push
もうもう: (もうもう) - mooing; moo-moo (i.e. kid's talk for "cow")
もう一つ: (もうひとつ) - another/one more; not quite/not very good/lacking
もう一人: (もうひとり) - another (person); the other person; one more (person)
もう一回: (もういっかい) - once more; once again
もう一寸: (もうちょっと) - a bit more; a bit longer
もう一踏ん張り: (もうひとふんばり) - holding out a little longer
もう一遍: (もういっぺん) - once more; again
もう一頑張り: (もうひとがんばり) - an extra effort; going the extra mile; one final push
もう少し: (mousukoshi) - um pouco mais, um pouco mais longo
もう少しで: (もうすこしで) - almost; nearly; close to
もう少しのところで: (もうすこしのところで) - almost; nearly; close to
もう少しの所で: (もうすこしのところで) - almost; nearly; close to
もがき苦しむ: (もがきくるしむ) - to writhe in agony
もがな: (もがな) - particle used to indicate the speaker's hope, desire, wish, etc. (e.g. "it would be nice if ...", "I wish there were ...", etc.)
もぎ取る: (もぎとる) - to pluck off (esp. by twisting)/to pick/to break off/to tear off; to wrest (away from)/to wrench free/to snatch (away)
もく: (もく) - (from a reversal of くも)  cigarette; cig; smoke; fag
もくもく: (mokumoku) - rising (fumaça, nuvens, etc.), rolling up, billowing up
もく拾い: (もくひろい) - gathering cigarette butts; person gathering cigarette butts
もぐもぐ: (mogumogu) - resmungando, mastigando as palavras; mastigando (comida); contorcendo-se, se debatendo
もぐら打ち: (もぐらうち) - driving away moles by hitting the ground with straw bundles prepared by children (esp. as an annual event on January 15th)
もぐり込む: (もぐりこむ) - to slip into/to crawl into (under)/to conceal oneself (under); to sneak into/to infiltrate
もごもご: (もごもご) - mumbling/chewing one's words; chewing (food); squirming/wriggling
もさもさ: (モサモサ) - hairy (person)/thickly bearded person; slow person/dull person
もさる事ながら: (もさることながら) - one may well say so, but ...; even more than
もし: (もし) - excuse me! (when calling out to someone)
もしあれば: (もしあれば) - if any; if it exists
もしかし: (もしかし) - perhaps; maybe; by some chance
もしかしなくても: (もしかしなくても) - no need to guess; certainly
もしそうなら: (もしそうなら) - if so; in that case
もしもし: (moshimoshi) - hello (por exemplo, no telefone); excuse me! (when calling out to someone)
もしもの事: (もしものこと) - emergency; accident; rare possibility; unexpected occurrence
もしゃもしゃ: (moshamosha) - desgrenhado, esfarrapado, espesso, desalinhado, desalinhado, descuidado, bagunçado, esfarrapado
もし可能ならば: (もしかのうならば) - if possible
もじもじ: (mojimoji) - tímida, hesitante, inquieta, impaciente, se contorcendo, se remexendo, de forma hesitante
もそもそ: (もそもそ) - creeping about; stirring restlessly; squirming
もぞもぞ: (もそもそ) - creeping about; stirring restlessly; squirming
もた: (もうた) - (after the -te form of a verb)  having done ... by mistake; having messed up ...
もたせ掛ける: (もたせかける) - to lean against; to set against
もたつく: (モタつく) - to be slow; to not make progress; to be inefficient
もたれ掛る: (もたれかかる) - to lean on/to recline on; to rely on/to depend on
もち: (もち) - of course; for sure; definitely
もちのろん: (もちのろん) - of course; certainly; naturally
もちはもち屋: (もちはもちや) - every man knows his own business best; one should go to specialists for the best results
もち粉: (もちこ) - glutinous rice flour; sticky rice flour
もち肌: (もちはだ) - soft skin; smooth skin
もっかい: (もっかい) - once more; once again
もっけの幸い: (もっけのさいわい) - windfall; piece of good luck
もっこり: (もっこり) - bulge in a pocket or clothing; "tent" an erection makes against pants or bedsheets
もったいを付ける: (もったいをつける) - to put on airs; to assume importance
もって回る: (もってまわる) - to carry around; to be roundabout (speech, actions, etc.)/to be indirect
